meanings.definition: Sounds that are sung or played on instruments.
meanings.sent1: I love listening to musics while I study.
meanings.sent2: The concert was filled with beautiful musics.
meanings.sent3: The musics at the party got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like sweet musics to his ears.
meanings.sent5: The musics in the park created a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The art of arranging sounds in time to produce a composition.
meanings.sent1: She studied musics in college to become a composer.
meanings.sent2: Mozart was a master of classical musics.
meanings.sent3: The musics in the movie perfectly matched the scenes.
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a symphony of different musics.
meanings.sent5: Learning about different musics can be very inspiring.

meanings.definition: The written or printed signs representing musical sounds.
meanings.sent1: The sheet musics were scattered all over the piano.
meanings.sent2: He struggled to read the musics during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked across the musics and made a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was filled with the beautiful musics on the page.
meanings.sent5: The musics on the paper seemed to dance off the page.
